verbs.description: six things [ARG0: christians and muslims] [V: disagree] [ARG2: about over jesussix] things christians and muslims disagree about over jesus do nt patronise both faiths by claiming there no difference between them how they view jesus is at the heart of this mirza qadyani israel haroun gotterdamerung jesus betake yeshua lee strobel the virgin mary rev nick armageddon
